roleset.name: manage, survive
roleset.note: FEND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'fend' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'ward'. (from fend.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: poor John
example.text: John just can't fend for himself.

example.name: transitive
example.text: The portfolio unit of the French bank group Credit Lyonnais told stock market regulators that it-1 bought 43,000 shares of Cie. de Navigation Mixte, apparently *trace*-1 to help *trace*-1 fend off an unwelcome takeover bid for the company.
example.arg: an unwelcome takeover bid for the company

example.name: with instrument
example.text: Although imports account for less than 1% of beer sales in Japan, [Asahi Breweries Ltd., which has been gaining share with its popular dry beer,]-1 plans *trace*-1 to fend off Japanese competitors by pouring $1.06 billion into facilities to brew 50% more beer.
example.arg: by pouring $1.06 billion into facilities to brew 50% more beer
